title: Travel Companion
description: A travel planning app that aggregates flights, hotels, and attractions into one itinerary.
introduction: Travel Companion is an innovative app designed to simplify travel planning by consolidating flights, hotels, and attractions into a single, customizable itinerary. This app aims to streamline the travel planning process, making it easier for users to organize their trips efficiently.

sections.title: Motivation
sections.body: The motivation behind developing Travel Companion stems from the frustration of using multiple platforms to plan a trip. By integrating flight, hotel, and attraction data into one app, users can save time and enjoy a seamless planning experience.

sections.title: Data Aggregation
sections.body: The app aggregates data from various sources using APIs like Google Maps for attractions, Skyscanner for flights, and Booking.com for hotels. Ensuring real-time data accuracy and handling API rate limits are key challenges addressed during development.

sections.title: User Interface Design
sections.body: A user-friendly interface was developed using React Native, allowing users to input preferences and view suggested itineraries. The app caters to different preferences by offering filters for budget, luxury, and other travel styles.

sections.title: Booking and Notifications
sections.body: The app provides direct booking options with integrated payment processing and security measures. Additionally, push notifications inform users about flight delays and itinerary changes, enhancing the overall user experience.

sections.title: Technical Implementation
sections.body: The backend was built using Node.js with Express, and data is stored in MongoDB for flexibility. Security is prioritized with HTTPS and API authentication tokens to protect user information.

sections.title: Testing and Marketing
sections.body: Automated testing frameworks ensure robustness across various user scenarios. Marketing strategies include partnerships with travel agencies and social media campaigns. Monetization includes in-app purchases and affiliate marketing.
